TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeTypeMemberCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

Docs.summary: オブジェクトのコレクションを表します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMemberCollection> class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember> objects.
## 例 The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMemberCollection> class. The example creates a new instance of the class and uses several methods to add statements to the collection, return their index, and add or remove attributes at a specific index point.
